properties.description: A warm welcoming space where you can come to meet with others, have free refreshments, and join in with the chats, games, jig saws or other activities. Also information about other support available if needed. We have a timetable of activities: Tuesday - All day - Food Hall. In the morning - Citizens Advice drop in sessions Wednesday - Crafts with lunch of soup & roll (free). DWP Job Club on alternate weeks in the afternoons. Thursday - East Suffolk Financial Inclusion team in the morning. Teatime Treats (free) in the afternoon. Access to books, games, jigsaws etc. available at all times.
properties.title: Number 28

properties.address: St. Andrews Church, Lowestoft, Suffolk NR32 2DQ
properties.description: Fully accessible and inclusive. Come and meet with friendly people and make friends. Free cafe. Each week we try to have help and support workers from local agencies. The Vicar is always available to be a listening ear, help direct people to advice points and always willing to pray for and with any who would find that helpful.
properties.title: Saint Andrews Warm Welcome

properties.address: Butchers Arms, London Road, Beccles, UK
properties.description: Join us for our weekly MeetUpMondays for a warm welcome, free cuppa and some friendly company. #DontBeOnYourOwn

properties.description: Weekly group sessions open to women,providing a place for them to just be themselves,share life experiences to learn,laugh and grow together. Allotment sessions in Lowestoft,Southwold & Beccles. Sessions run from end of February,email for times. Also co-ordinates Garden Angels and Let’s Talk Long Covid Facebook group.

properties.description: We sell houseplants, pots and local nature-themed crafts and our profits go towards running workshops and groups to raise wellbeing and reduce isolation in the local area. We are so keen for our space to be used in a positive way, by a wide range of people.

properties.description: Warm Welcomes is a warm welcoming safe space for everyone run by Bungay Community Support. We invite you to meet with others, have free refreshments and join in with friendly company. There are books, board games and other activities to enjoy. we can provide information on other support if needed.

properties.description: Come and join in this friendly and well attended coffee morning for coffee, cakes and chat on the first Thursday morning of each month. All welcome! Free but donations welcomed. More information on the Sotterley Chapel Preservation Trust Facebook page.
properties.title: Sotterley Chapel Preservation Trust Coffee Morning
